entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
